Module com.gersonfaneto.yams
Package com.gersonfaneto.yams.dao

Class DAO

java.lang.Object
com.gersonfaneto.yams.dao.DAO
public abstract class DAO extends Object
Defines a access point for the DAOs of each model in the System using the "Singleton" pattern. Each DAO is accessed through a static method.
See Also:
  • ClientCRUD
  • UserCRUD
  • PaymentCRUD
